formElement.documentation: ID or name of the team project.
formElement.label: Project:

formElement.documentation: ID or number of the build. Append * to do a number prefix search, but only latest build will be saved. Example: '20190110.1' or '26'
formElement.label: Build ID or Number:

formElement.documentation: Name for the Build Definition. This parameter is required if you've specified Build number in a "Build Id or Number" parameter.
formElement.label: Build Definition Name:

formElement.documentation: If checked, the procedure will poll the build status until the build is finished.
formElement.label: Wait for Build:

formElement.documentation: Timeout in seconds to wait for build to finish. Will be used if "Wait for build" is checked. Default is 300. Poll interval is set to 30 seconds, so this value should be multiple to 30.
formElement.label: Wait Timeout:

formElement.documentation: Format to save the request results.
formElement.label: Result Format:

formElement.documentation: Results will be saved into this property/property sheet.
formElement.label: Result Property Sheet:
